Sandy.Historic Gardner (UTA station):
Historic Gardner is a light rail station in the West Jordan, Utah, in the United States, served by the Red Line of the Utah Transit Authority's (UTA) TRAX light rail system. The Red Line provides service from the University of Utah to the Daybreak Community of South Jordan.


== Description ==
The station is located at 1127 West 7800 South and is easily accessible from that road.
